attributes.action: call on the MOD to introduce pensions for all ex armed services who served more than five years and were discharged without pensions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ex-Members of the Armed services who served less than 22 years prior to March 1975 be awarded pensions for their time served.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
